name: Chrome Control
readme:
A workflow that allows you to fuzzy search all open tabs, jump to any tab, close duplicate tabs, close tabs by keyword or url.

Alfred Chrome Control Commands:

`tabs`: Lists all tabs

`close url <keywords>`: Close tabs with URLs matching these keywords

`close title <keywords>`: Close tabs with titles matching these keywords

`dedup`: Close duplicate tabs

You can find the source code of this workflow here [1]

Also see my "How I Navigate Hundreds of Tabs on Chrome with JXA and Alfred" article [2] if you're interested in learning how I created the workflow.

[1] https://github.com/bit2pixel/chrome-control

[2] https://medium.com/@bit2pixel/how-i-navigate-hundreds-of-tabs-on-chrome-with-jxa-and-alfred-9bbf971af02b
